entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Economy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
